statements: SELECT * FROM samples;
SELECT sample_name, sample_type, collection_date FROM samples;
SELECT sample_id, sample_name, storage_location FROM samples ORDER BY sample_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM samples WHERE collection_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT sample_id, sample_name FROM samples WHERE sample_type = 'Blood';
SELECT * FROM samples WHERE sample_type = 'Blood' ORDER BY collection_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sample_name, storage_location FROM samples WHERE collection_date < '2021-01-01'
SELECT sample_id, sample_name, collection_date FROM samples WHERE sample_type = 'Urine' AND storage_location LIKE '%freezer%'
SELECT sample_name, collection_date, storage_location FROM samples ORDER BY sample_id ASC
SELECT * FROM samples WHERE sample_id IN (1001, 1003, 1005)
SELECT * FROM samples WHERE organism = 'bacteria';
SELECT sample_name, location FROM samples WHERE collection_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT experiment_id, start_date, result FROM experiments WHERE experiment_type = 'RNA sequencing';
SELECT * FROM samples ORDER BY sample_name DESC;
SELECT sample_name, location FROM samples WHERE organism = 'virus' ORDER BY sample_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM samples WHERE organism = 'Human' ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT sample_name, location FROM samples WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT sample_id, sample_name, collection_date FROM samples WHERE location = 'Lab' AND organism = 'Virus' ORDER BY collection_date ASC;
SELECT sample_id, COUNT(experiment_id) AS num_experiments FROM experiments GROUP BY sample_id HAVING num_experiments > 3;
SELECT e.experiment_id, e.sample_id, e.experiment_type, s.sample_name FROM experiments e JOIN samples s ON e.sample_id = s.sample_id WHERE e.result IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM sample_metadata;
SELECT sample_name, sample_type, collection_date FROM sample_metadata;
SELECT sample_id, sample_name, sample_type, collection_date FROM sample_metadata WHERE sample_type = 'Blood';
SELECT annotation_type, annotation_value FROM sample_annotations;
SELECT measurement_id, measurement_type, measurement_value, measurement_unit FROM sample_measurements WHERE measurement_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT * FROM sample_metadata ORDER BY collection_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sample_name, sample_type FROM sample_metadata WHERE sample_type = 'blood';
SELECT sample_measurements.sample_id, AVG(measurement_value) as average_value FROM sample_measurements GROUP BY sample_measurements.sample_id HAVING AVG(measurement_value) > 10;

SELECT sample_metadata.sample_name, sample_measurements.measurement_type, sample_annotations.annotation_type FROM sample_metadata JOIN sample_measurements ON sample_metadata.sample_id = sample_measurements.sample_id JOIN sample_annotations ON sample_metadata.sample_id = sample_annotations.sample_id;

SELECT sample_name, count(measurement_id) as measurement_count FROM sample_metadata JOIN sample_measurements ON sample_metadata.sample_id = sample_measurements.sample_id GROUP BY sample_name HAVING count(measurement_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM sample_info;
SELECT sample_id, sample_name FROM sample_info WHERE sample_id = 1;
SELECT sample_name, researcher_name FROM sample_info WHERE collection_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM sample_metadata ORDER BY metadata_id DESC;
SELECT result_id, result_data FROM sample_results WHERE sample_id = 2 ORDER BY result_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM sample_info;
SELECT sample_name, researcher_name FROM sample_info WHERE sample_id = 1;
SELECT metadata_key, metadata_value FROM sample_metadata ORDER BY metadata_key ASC;
SELECT result_data FROM sample_results WHERE result_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY result_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sample_analysis WHERE analysis_type LIKE 'Chemical%' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM samples
SELECT sample_name, organism_name FROM samples
SELECT sample_id, organism_name, collection_date FROM samples WHERE organism_name = 'Bacteria'
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE organization = 'University'
SELECT researcher_name, email FROM researchers ORDER BY researcher_name DESC
SELECT * FROM samples JOIN results ON samples.sample_id = results.measurement_id WHERE sample_name = 'Sample A' ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT sample_id, sample_name, organism_name, collection_date FROM samples WHERE organism_name IN ('Organism A', 'Organism B')
SELECT experiment_name, description FROM experiments WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-06-30'
SELECT researcher_name, email, organization FROM researchers ORDER BY researcher_name ASC
SELECT measurement_name, value, measurement_date FROM measurements JOIN samples ON measurements.sample_id = samples.sample_id WHERE samples.organism_name = 'Organism C'
